pingMessage:
I am a Yu-Gi-Oh! card bot made by AlphaKretin#7990.
Price data is from the <https://yugiohprices.com> API.
You can find my help file and source here: <https://github.com/AlphaKretin/bastion-bot/>
You can support my development on Patreon here: <https://www.patreon.com/alphakretinbots>
Type `.commands` to be DMed a short summary of my commands without going to an external website.
